precaution: Remove any objects you may knock off from the table
instruction: Rest your right hand on the table with your palm facing down.
Spread apart your index and middle fingers as much as you can.
Bring your index and middle fingers back together.
Spread apart your middle and ring fingers.
Bring your middle and ring fingers back together.
Spread apart your ring and little fingers.
Bring your ring and little fingers back together.
Spread apart your thumb and index fingers.
Bring your thumb and index fingers back together.
